title: McLaren boss Zak Brown clashes with Alex Palou lawyer: 'You are talking rubbish!'
summary: Zak Brown came under attack in court today, but wasn't afraid to shoot back, as he attempted to justify why his McLaren team is owed $20.7m by IndyCar champion Alex Palou.

qa_pairs.question: What position does Zak Brown hold in McLaren?
Which championship did Alex Palou win?
How much money is McLaren claiming from Alex Palou?
